author: adapdoaosdaoda
description: Event scheduling polling system with dropdown menus and conflict detection. Allows users to vote for preferred times for various events (Party, Breaking Army, Showdown) while preventing conflicting time selections.
install_msg: Thank you for installing EventPolling! Use `[p]eventpoll create` to create your first event poll.
short: Event scheduling polls with conflict detection
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user selections for event scheduling polls. Users can clear their data by having an admin use the `[p]eventpoll clear` command.
